package wang.datahub.service;


import org.springframework.beans.factory.annotation.Autowired;
import org.springframework.kafka.core.reactive.ReactiveKafkaProducerTemplate;
import org.springframework.stereotype.Service;
import reactor.core.publisher.Mono;
import reactor.kafka.sender.SenderResult;
import wang.datahub.dto.Warehouse;

import java.util.Random;

@Service
public class WarehouseService {

 Â  Â public static final String[] WAREHOUSE_NAME = new String[]{"å¤©æ´¥ä»“åº“","åŒ—äº¬ä»“åº“","ä¸Šæµ·ä»“åº“","å¹¿å·ä»“åº“","æ·±åœ³ä»“åº“"};
 Â  Â public static final String[] WAREHOUSE_LEVEL = new String[]{"Açº§","Bçº§","Cçº§","Dçº§","Eçº§"};


 Â  Â public Warehouse mock(long id) {
 Â  Â  Â  Â Random random = new Random();
 Â  Â  Â  Â try {
 Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â Thread.sleep(random.nextInt(2000));
 Â  Â  Â   } catch (InterruptedException e) {
 Â  Â  Â   }

 Â  Â  Â  Â Warehouse warehouse = new Warehouse();
 Â  Â  Â  Â warehouse.setId(id);
 Â  Â  Â  Â warehouse.setName(WAREHOUSE_NAME[random.nextInt(WAREHOUSE_NAME.length)]);
 Â  Â  Â  Â warehouse.setLabel(WAREHOUSE_LEVEL[random.nextInt(WAREHOUSE_LEVEL.length)]);
 Â  Â  Â  Â warehouse.setLon(random.nextDouble()+"");
 Â  Â  Â  Â warehouse.setLat(random.nextDouble()+"");
 Â  Â  Â  Â return warehouse;
 Â   }


 Â  Â @Autowired
 Â  Â private ReactiveKafkaProducerTemplate template;

 Â  Â public static final String WAREHOUSE_TOPIC = "warehouse";

 Â  Â public Mono<Boolean> add(Warehouse warehouse) {
 Â  Â  Â  Â Mono<SenderResult<Void>> resultMono = template.send(WAREHOUSE_TOPIC, warehouse.getId(), warehouse);
 Â  Â  Â  Â return resultMono.flatMap(rs -> {
 Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â if(rs.exception() != null) {
 Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â System.out.println("send kafka error" + rs.exception());
 Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â return Mono.just(false);
 Â  Â  Â  Â  Â   }
 Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â return Mono.just(true);
 Â  Â  Â   });
 Â   }


}
